title: Zeonic Front: Kidou Senshi Gundam 0079 - Zeon no Hifun

synonyms: Mobile Suit Gundam: Zeonic Front Special Movie
Kidou Senshi Gundam: Zeonic Front - Indignation of Zeon.
alternative_titles.en: Mobile Suit Gundam: Zeonic Front - Indignation of Zeon.
alternative_titles.ja: ジオニックフロント 機動戦士ガンダム0079 ジオンの悲憤

synopsis:
Short animated recap of the One Year War from the perspective of LCDR. Garret Schmitzer. 

Included on the game disc of the Mobile Suit Gundam: Zeonic Front, a PS2 game by BANDAI.
